mapper.select: select userid, passwd, name, email, regdate from member2 order by userid desc
select userid, passwd, content, content, name, email, regdate from member2 where userid=#{userid}
mapper.insert: insert into member2(userid, passwd, name, email, regdate) values (#{userid}, #{passwd}, #{name}, #{email}, sysdate)

mapper.select: select * from member2 where userid=#{userid} and passwd=#{passwd}
